Red.description: The amount of red color in the light. Forces uses PBR, so you should take a color value within a 0-1 range and multiply it by 1000.

Green.description: The amount of green color in the light. Forces uses PBR, so you should take a color value within a 0-1 range and multiply it by 1000.

Blue.description: The amount of blue color in the light. Forces uses PBR, so you should take a color value within a 0-1 range and multiply it by 1000.
